LanguageData.HellcatBurner.label: hellcat burner
LanguageData.HellcatBurner.description: Expend a pressurized bioferrite charge to create a burst of flame.
LanguageData.IncineratorBurner.label: incinerator burner
LanguageData.IncineratorBurner.description: Expend a pressurized bioferrite charge to create a massive cone of flame.
